text: I'm sister Cecilia I'm a nun of new
skete which is located in Cambridge New
York we've been here since 1969 although
the monastery was built in 1971 is when
we moved up here when we got here we
were trying to find a work that we could
support ourselves with one of the
sisters who joined us suggested that
perhaps she can make apple pies and
cheesecakes and supply the restaurants
in the area so he said we'll try it
after a year it seemed like it was
pretty regular work so we decided yes
she's cakes by the way something that we
can do that is not so time-consuming
that you don't have time to reflect and
you know live the rest of your life it
requires you to keep active and for me
managing it I mean I have a lot of
figuring and planning and stuff to do
this you don't need to play in there
since I'm 80 years old I'm amazing I can
still do it but I merely enjoy doing it
in fact in doing cheesecake's work I
think many of the sisters have found you
feel like you accomplished something
when you've been in there three hours
working and you've got 200 cakes made
there's a relationship between the
actual making of the cheesecake and the
concentration and meditation be present
in the now in doing the mixing I like to
walk around in a circle whether or not
to go forward push don't push too hard
it's not good for the the Machine and
it's not good for my arm my shoulder
there's no such thing was retiring in
the past for the most of the time living
here there were at least 12 nuns living
here so to be down to only five people
is really a change that's reason why
we've hired people so that they wouldn't
have to do quite as much as they used to
ages of age I've worried a lot when I
was much younger but we've always
managed to come through and seemingly we
are provided for
